text: City of Thieves may refer to: * City of Thieves (gamebook), a 1983 single- player adventure gamebook written by Ian Livingstone * City of Thieves (album), an album released by Sonic Boom Six * City of Thieves (novel), a 2008 historical fiction novel by David Benioff * City of Thieves, an episode in the first season of Adventure Time
title: City of Thieves
